required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relation Between Dose and Time to Reinjection of Botulinum Toxin-A in Patient With Poststroke Spasticity From a Real-world Healthcare Insurance Database.
clinical_study.official_title: Relation Between Dose and Time to Reinjection of Botulinum Toxin-A in Patient With Poststroke Spasticity From a Real-world Healthcare Insurance Database.

brief_summary.textblock: Determining the mean/median time between botulinum toxin-A injection within the treatment of patients with spasticity after stroke in relation to the botulinum toxin dose from a healthcare insurance database in the Netherlands.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean time to next injection per brand
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

primary_outcome.measure: Median time to next injection per brand
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

primary_outcome.measure: Dosing of botulinum toxin-A in daily practice in relation to time to next injection
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

secondary_outcome.measure: Average cost per year per brand per patient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

secondary_outcome.measure: Exploring factors like age, gender, time since diagnosis stroke that influence dosing and time between botulinum toxin-A treatments
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time interval between 2 injections of the same brand
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to end of data collection (January 2012 up to December 2016)

study_pop.textblock: All patients selected from the database claimed within the code 313 will be included in the descriptive analyses.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- A patient will be included if he has a diagnosis stroke within the rehabilitation setting and has received at least two injections of botulinum toxin-A: Dysport or Botox
Exclusion Criteria:
- A patient will be excluded if he has been only treated with Xeomin
